name: Watch (TL 7)
description:
A chronometer worn on the wrist or carried in the pocket.This device is waterproof to a depth of 3 (TL - 4) and includes the following functions

  • Alarm
  • Calculator
  • Chronograph
  • Chronometer
  • Pedwatch

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
